description: This file defines the main application component for a React-based web application, handling routing, navigation, modal dialogs, and integrating various subcomponents such as DeviceTable, DeviceForm, DeviceDetails, and ToastContainer.

methods.name: goHome
methods.description: Navigates the router to the home path ('/').

methods.name: openAdd
methods.description: Opens the modal form for adding a new device.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the modal form for editing the specified device.

methods.name: onFormSuccess
methods.description: Handles successful form submission, closing the modal and triggering data refetch if needed.
